attributes.action: Force David Cameron to complete Term and remain as Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details: The evidence is in the current situation. We must ask and force David Cameron to stay and run the country. We have tough times ahead of us and I believe, as do many others that David is the best man for the job.
attributes.background: We do not require this turmoil as in the Labour Party. We need our Prime Minister to stay and do his job. We lost the referendum but no way we can loose the party to half-wits
